item.title: Report E-2025030456
item.description:
Report E-2025030456

Identified by scraper @ 2025-04-15T00:53:32+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-17
  • City: West Groton
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNIVAR SOLUTIONS USA INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Univar Solutions' driver was delivering Sulfuric acid to our customer in West Groton, MA. Customer advised driver on arrival that the load would not fit as it was ordered too early. Driver and customer planned to stop the delivery at 3600 gallons on customer's tank meter (relative to Storage tank capacity of 4000 gallons). During unload, driver went to check the meter at 3300 gallons and found the tank overflowing into the containment dike. The overflow was coming from the overflow pipe. It did not come out of the top of the tank at any time. Delivery was immediately stopped. Customer was notified of the spill as she was not aware it happened. Customer's Supervisor was alerted to the spill by the receiver. Customer supervisor advised their tank meter was inaccurate causing the overflow which was contained in the containment dike.
